issue.title: [Python] Review public pyarrow.* API completeness and update docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-818](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-818). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are still many names missing from pyarrow.\* and ARROW-797. We should do a final review and update before 0.3

comments.body:
